actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the act of August 10, 1961, to authorize further additions to Fort Necessity National Battlefield, Pa.

summary.text: Authorizes additional land, and appropriations for such additions, to Fort Necessity National Battlefield, Pennsylvania. (Amends 16 U.S.C. 430)

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of August 10, 1961, to authorize further additions to Fort Necessity National Battlefield, Pa.
